findings.title: Active smart contract owner privileges constitute an elevated impact to smart contract safety and security
findings.description: Gami's smart contract has an ACTIVE OWNERSHIP with multiple 'Write Contract' privileges, including PAUSE CONTRACT, BURN FROM, DELEGATE, PERMIT, SNAPSHOT, which constitutes an elevated impact on smart contract safety and security.

findings.title: Pause or un-pause the smart contract function modules
findings.description: The active smart contract owner has the privilege to pause or un-pause the smart contract function modules, which constitutes an elevated impact to smart contract safety and security.
